alert.note: Alert for Guilford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 4:35PM EDT until May 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR WEST CENTRAL ALAMANCE AND NORTHEASTERN GUILFORD COUNTIES... At 434 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elon, or near Burlington, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Graham, McLeansville, Elon, Gibsonville, Haw River, Alamance, Glen Raven, Lake Mackintosh Marina and Lake Guilford Mackintosh Marina. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
